notes: Microsoft Cloud gross margin percentage decreased year-over-year to 69%, excluding the impact of the latest change in accounting estimate, driven by continued strong demand for our AI services, partially offset by improvement in Azure, inclusive of scaling of our datacenter infrastructure to meet customer demand, and a higher mix of lower margin hardware sales.
Microsoft Cloud includes Azure and other cloud services, Office 365 Commercial, the commercial portion of LinkedIn, Dynamics 365, and other cloud properties.
Includes non-GAAP constant currency ("CC") growth. See Appendix for reconciliation of GAAP and non-GAAP measures. Growth rates in GAAP and CC are equivalent unless otherwise noted.
